Uses of Class
net.sourceforge.reb4j.CharClass

Uses of CharClass in net.sourceforge.reb4j
 

Fields in net.sourceforge.reb4j declared as CharClass
static CharClass CharClass.LOWERCASE
          Matches all lowercase characters, as defined by the Character class.
static CharClass CharClass.MIRRORED
          Matches all mirrored characters, as defined by the Character class.
static CharClass CharClass.PERL_DIGIT
          Matches all decimal digits using the corresponding Perl-style character class.
static CharClass CharClass.PERL_NONDIGIT
          Matches all characters that are not decimal digits using the corresponding Perl-style character class.
static CharClass CharClass.PERL_NONSPACE
          Matches all characters except ASCII whitespace characters.
static CharClass CharClass.PERL_NONWORD
          Matches all "non-word" characters, as defined by the Perl-style '\W' character class.
static CharClass CharClass.PERL_SPACE
          Matches all ASCII whitespace characters, as defined by the Perl-style '\s' character class.
static CharClass CharClass.PERL_WORD
          Matches all "word" characters, as defined by the Perl-style '\w' character class.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_ALNUM
          Matches all decimal digits AND ASCII alphabetic characters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_ALPHA
          Matches all ASCII alphabetic characters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_ASCII
          Matches all ASCII characters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_BLANK
          Matches spaces and tabs.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_CNTRL
          Matches all ASCII control characters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_DIGIT
          Matches all decimal digits.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_GRAPH
          Matches all ASCII graphical characters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_LOWER
          Matches ASCII lowercase letters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_PRINT
          Matches all ASCII printable characters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_PUNCT
          Matches all ASCII punctuation characters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_SPACE
          Matches all ASCII whitespace characters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_UPPER
          Matches ASCII uppercase letters.
static CharClass CharClass.POSIX_XDIGIT
          Matches all hexadecimal digit characters.
static CharClass CharClass.UPPERCASE
          Matches all uppercase characters, as defined by the Character class.
static CharClass CharClass.WHITESPACE
          Matches all whitespace characters, as defined by the Character class.
 

Methods in net.sourceforge.reb4j that return CharClass
static CharClass CharClass.characters(CharSequence characters)
          Creates a CharClass that matches any of the specified characters.
static CharClass CharClass.characters(CharSequence characters, boolean negate)
          Creates a CharClass that matches any of the specified characters, or if negate is true, any character except those specified.
static CharClass CharClass.intersection(CharClass... operands)
          Constructs a CharClass representing the intersection of all the specified character classes.
static CharClass CharClass.negate(CharClass charClass)
          Constructs a CharClass representing the inverse of the specified argument CharClass.
static CharClass CharClass.notUnicodeBlock(String blockName)
          Constructs a CharClass matching all characters NOT within the specified named Unicode block, as defined by the Character class.
static CharClass CharClass.notUnicodeCategory(String category)
          Constructs a CharClass matching all characters NOT within the specified named Unicode category, as defined by the Character class.
static CharClass CharClass.range(char first, char last)
          Constructs a character class representing a range of characters.
static CharClass CharClass.range(char first, char last, boolean negate)
          Constructs a character class representing a range of characters or its inverse.
static CharClass CharClass.unicodeBlock(String blockName)
          Constructs a CharClass matching all characters within the specified named Unicode block, as defined by the Character class.
static CharClass CharClass.unicodeCategory(String category)
          Constructs a CharClass matching all characters within the specified named Unicode category, as defined by the Character class.
static CharClass CharClass.union(CharClass... operands)
          Constructs a CharClass representing the union of all the specified CharClasses.
